name: Omelegg - #1 Egg online chat site
description:
- Made for Low Effort Jam 11 in ~9 hours (10 hours if you count fiddling with WebGL export settings) for which I wrongly assumed the theme was egg-

Welcome to Omelegg, the world's #1 online chat service for egg lovers!

Have a great time talking about your love for eggs with other users, but be wary of impostors and non-believers!

Don't worry about what you type! Just smash your keyboard and your true feelings will come across. Also make sure you have audio enabled :D

How to Play is accessed through the instructions button. 

(Basically chat to anything vaguely egg related, press ESC or the disconnect button to disconnect from anything non-egg related)

This might be the dumbest thing I ever made but it was a lot of fun.

Software used: Unity 2020.3.0f1, Google Images, Snipping Tool, Audacity

(For some reason Unity's Canvas refuses to scale to anything other than 1920x1080 and it's too high effort to fix. If you set your browser zoom to like 80% it should work fine :P)
